name: Butterfly Sky
summary: Use your jumping skills and time your landings to collect butterflies in this massively addicting endless-jumper that will have you saying, “just one more round!” It’s up to Brian to feed the picky whale who doesn’t eat fish. Collect and upgrade 4 handy power-ups while jumping on clouds in the sky. Upgrade your clothing, your house, and even your power-ups using your hard-earned butterflies. And don’t forget to level up your character for bigger bonuses and score multipliers!
